s_synopsis: Have the fight of your life! The heat is on and so is the fight! Here you meet the tough guys head to head in this edge-of-the-seat, action-packed beat-em-up! In Arcade mode you will face a range of even meaner opponents and end up facing your worst nightmare.. or you could take up to seven other people in the thrilling tournament mode or even go one-on-one with a partner in the evenly matched two-player game.. but whatever option you choose, there is no doubting that you'll have the fight of your life!
